text: GLMakie 0.1.25 won’t precompile on OSX with Julia 1.6.0-beta1. Known issue or should this be filed?

elements.text: GLMakie 0.1.25 won’t precompile on OSX with Julia 1.6.0-beta1. Known issue or should this be filed?

text: What's the error?

elements.text: What's the error?

text:
```julia> using GLMakie
[ Info: Precompiling GLMakie [e9467ef8-e4e7-5192-8a1a-b1aee30e663a]
ERROR: LoadError: UndefVarError: to_gl_text not defined
Stacktrace:
 [1] _precompile_()
   @ GLMakie ~/.julia/packages/GLMakie/TcsJL/src/precompile.jl:9
 [2] top-level scope
   @ ~/.julia/packages/GLMakie/TcsJL/src/GLMakie.jl:82
 [3] include
   @ ./Base.jl:386 [inlined]
 [4] include_package_for_output(pkg::Base.PkgId, input::String, depot_path::Vector{String}, dl_load_path::Vector{String}, load_path::Vector{String}, concrete_deps::Vector{Pair{Base.PkgId, UInt64}}, source::Nothing)
   @ Base ./loading.jl:1209
 [5] top-level scope
   @ none:1
 [6] eval
   @ ./boot.jl:360 [inlined]
 [7] eval(x::Expr)
   @ Base.MainInclude ./client.jl:446
 [8] top-level scope
   @ none:1
in expression starting at /Users/jonalm/.julia/packages/GLMakie/TcsJL/src/GLMakie.jl:1
ERROR: Failed to precompile GLMakie [e9467ef8-e4e7-5192-8a1a-b1aee30e663a] to /Users/jonalm/.julia/compiled/v1.6/GLMakie/jl_gbI8FI.
Stacktrace:
 [1] error(s::String)
   @ Base ./error.jl:33
 [2] compilecache(pkg::Base.PkgId, path::String, internal_stderr::Base.TTY, internal_stdout::Base.TTY)
   @ Base ./loading.jl:1356
 [3] compilecache(pkg::Base.PkgId, path::String)
   @ Base ./loading.jl:1302
 [4] _require(pkg::Base.PkgId)
   @ Base ./loading.jl:1017
 [5] require(uuidkey::Base.PkgId)
   @ Base ./loading.jl:910
 [6] require(into::Module, mod::Symbol)
   @ Base ./loading.jl:897```

text: and yes you can just nuke the .julia/compiled/v1.6 folder to clear the precompile cache
